name: hdfs
description: Hadoop Distributed File System (HDFS), Highly Available
postInstallNotes:
The Hadoop Distributed File System (HDFS) DCOS Service implementation has been successfully installed! Note that the service is alpha and there may be bugs, incomplete features, incorrect documentation or other discrepancies.
In order for HDFS to start successfully, all resources must be available in the cluster, including ports, CPU shares, RAM and disk.
We recommend a minimum of five slaves with at least 2 CPU's and 8GB of RAM available for use by the HDFS Service.

	Documentation: https://github.com/mesosphere/hdfs
	Issues: https://github.com/mesosphere/hdfs/issues
